nodes.text:
(alias) function parseEther(ether: string, unit?: "wei" | "gwei"): bigint
import parseEther
nodes.docs:
Converts a string representation of ether to numerical wei.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/docs/utilities/parseEther
The address that funded the distribution
Distributes rewards to opted-in token holders and waits for confirmation.
tags:
```ts
import { createClient, http } from 'viem'
import { privateKeyToAccount } from 'viem/accounts'
import { tempo } from 'viem/chains'
import { tempoActions } from 'viem/tempo'

const client = createClient({
  account: privateKeyToAccount('0x...'),
  chain: tempo({ feeToken: '0x20c0000000000000000000000000000000000001' })
  transport: http(),
}).extend(tempoActions())

const { funder, amount, receipt } = await client.reward.distributeSync({
  amount: 100000000000000000000n,
  token: '0x20c0000000000000000000000000000000000001',
})
```
The funder, amount, and transaction receipt.

nodes.docs: The amount of tokens to distribute (must be > 0)

virtualFiles.content:
// @filename: viem.config.ts
import { createClient, http, publicActions, walletActions } from 'viem'
import { privateKeyToAccount } from 'viem/accounts'
import { tempoModerato } from 'viem/chains'
import { tempoActions } from 'viem/tempo'

export const client = createClient({
  account: privateKeyToAccount('0x...'),
  chain: tempoModerato,
  transport: http(),
})
  .extend(publicActions)
  .extend(walletActions)
  .extend(tempoActions())
